content.value:
We’re a five minute walk from Bogota’s space for festivals, concerts and more.
To the north of Bogota is a neighborhood known as Chicó Norte. Formerly residential, this area is now buzzing with embassies, government offices, and the headquarters of large international companies. Stay here for direct access to the business nerve of Bogota, complete with restaurants, bars, shopping and start-up energy.

Selina is a haven for nomads, travelers, and explorers redefining what it means to travel, work, and explore. If you’re looking for a unique, immersive, purpose-filled experience, you’re looking for Selina. Selinas dorms are not like you would find in your typical hostel. We set the standard at a whole new level with a seating area, your own light, a personal shelf and locker for each bunk bed to keep your things secure. Bathrooms are shared. Our private rooms are the perfect option for someone who likes their privacy. We have options suitable for all budgets.

To the north of Bogota is a neighborhood known as Chicó Norte. Formerly residential, this area is now buzzing with embassies, government offices, and the headquarters of large international companies. Stay here for direct access to the business nerve of Bogota, complete with restaurants, bars, shopping and start-up energy. We’re walking distance from Parque La 93, the epicenter for concerts, festivals and fairs in Bogota.

description.description: Selina Parque 93 Bogota is perfectly positioned for taking full advantage of the food, culture, and festivals of Bogota. Enjoy a delicious, healthy menu at The Playground, wellness events, movie night in our cinema room, a full calendar of activities, and one of the first Selina bookstores – all on site!
